name: Happy Yak Sunny Rice Salad With Broccoli And Red Kidney Beans
categories: Sunny Rice Salad With Broccoli And Red Kidney
description: Who doesn’t love a crisp delicious salad on a hot summer day? Healthy eating in the backcountry has never been so easy.Ingredients: rice, dehydrated and/or freeze dried red kidney beans, chicken soup base (glucose solids, yeast extract, chicken meat, hydrolyzed soy and corn proteins, corn flour, sea salt, chicken fat, potato starch, onion powder, spices), freeze dried Peas, freeze dried broccoli, orange flavoured Mix (sugar, citric acid, glucose solids, sodium citrate, artificial flavouring, arabic gum, colour, sucralose), freeze dried red bell pepper, orange peels, spices, dried parsley.May contain: peanuts, nuts, sesame, milk, egg, shrimp, wheat.
